title: Healthcare Enterprise Account Executive, Major Accounts
summary: The US Healthcare team at Apple is responsible for building a balanced and scalable business that delivers health focused benefits to end-customers. This role involves transforming enterprise businesses and growing top-line revenue for Apple by gaining deep understandings of businesses and collaborating to build innovative solutions.
description: In this role you will: Advise on transformational solutions with our partners in Healthcare (hospital systems) for Apple’s Enterprise Major Accounts. Develop account plans aligned with our customers’ strategies, assess their progress, and guide them on the journey of transformation to mobility, while growing adoption of the Apple ecosystem. Effectively complete plans by cross-functionally partnering with Systems Engineers, Inside Sales, resellers, and strategic partners. Build demand generation activities, identify new opportunities, accurately forecast, and coordinate fulfillment logistics.
key_qualifications: Proven consultative selling experience in business transformation solutions for large enterprises, typically requires 8 years of Account Executive experience with large Enterprise accounts, familiarity with healthcare hospital systems, experience in developing and maintaining C-level relationships within accounts, strengths in relationship development/management, teaming across functions, deal making, and negotiations.
preferred_qualifications: The ideal candidate brings the highest level of integrity, honesty, and accountability, contributes effectively to their team, is a subject matter expert in healthcare hospital systems, excels in presenting and handling pressure, deeply understands customer needs, and always aims to exceed customer expectations.
